properties.entry: INSERT INTO Members (MEMBER_NAME, LAUNCH_DATE, DIVISION_CODE, DETAIL_INFO, STUDENT_QUANTITY, CONTACT, TEAM_CODE, ACTIVE_STATUS) VALUES ( ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
UPDATE MEMBER_INFO SET MEMBER_NAME = ?, LAUNCH_DATE = ?, DIVISION_CODE = ?, DETAIL_INFO = ?, STUDENT_QUANTITY = ?, CONTACT = ?, TEAM_CODE = ?, ACTIVE_STATUS = ? WHERE MEMBER_CODE = ?
